text: Stojan Andov (; 30 November 1935 – 18 June 2024) was a Macedonian politician. He was a founding member of the Liberal Party of Macedonia. He was a president of Parliament from 1993 to 1997.Кратка биографија од сајтот на Собранието на Република Македонија From October to November 1995, he was Acting President of North Macedonia. Andov died on 18 June 2024, at the age of 88 in Skopje. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Presidents of North Macedonia
title: Stojan Andov
